title: Nude na Shisen
sinopse:
1-3) Nude na Shisen -
Nishitaka, a famous landscape photographer, agrees to do a photo shoot with people, with two conditions- it has to be with the male model Ritsuya and the pictures have to be nudes!
This story is continued in Tsumi to Kuchizuke: Nude na Egoist (Ch. 5)

4. Scandalous Lips (A Silky Kiss) -
   A successful male supermodel, Taiga Ren, agrees to model for a designer, Tsukishima Keiichi, but the price is the designer's body...

5. Lying Lips (Usotsuki na Kuchibiru) -
   The #1 host at a host club, Takaki Reiichi, has a one night stand with the new #2 host, Suou Akira. He says it was just sex. Was it really?

(Source: MU)
